title: I reported a bug and now riot is punishing me.
body: I reported that it wasn't letting me gift a friend a mystery skin, now they set me back to a older version of the client while I was in game an actual game twice.

replies.body:
The error you're getting about rolling back to an older version of the client can be caused by a security setting or corrupt game files failing to update.  It's not something we could do, or have any reason to punish you.  My suggestion would be to go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this, alongside the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to run a clean reinstall.

I'm not sure what the gifting issue is though, I'm happy to help with some more details!
So I tried the Hextech repair tool reinstall feature. All that happened is now I keep getting this error 004 while trying to download.

Heya, this error can happen if something is blocking access so it sounds like a security setting to me.  I suggest running through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide first so you can gain access to using the HRT or running League.
